A4.text: Russell's grand slam was the first in a World Series game since Paul Konerko of the crosstown Chicago White Sox in 2005, as well as the first by a visiting player since Lonnie Smith in 1992.

A5.text: Freddie Freeman hit a walk‑off grand slam in Game 1 of the 2025 World Series.

A6.text: In the first inning, right fielder Elmer Smith hit the first Series grand slam.

A7.text: The team would not reach the heights of 1920 again for 28 years.

A8.text: The Cubs broke a late 3–3 tie in the bottom of the eighth thanks to a grand slam from Miguel Montero to take Game 1.
